title: Bloomberg Markets: Banks Told to Keep Skin in the Game
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Banks Told to Keep Skin in the Game
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Nabila Ahmed Senior Corporate Finance Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Wall Street selling collateralized loan obligations, a cousin of those complex debt instruments that went horribly wrong during the 2008 financial crisis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
